segments.text: I notice the warm light filling this kitchen space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems content, focused on her task with the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running unchecked, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the sink area, a wasteful sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the growing puddle, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs precariously on the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for cookies, the girl waiting expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky adventure could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame their small figures so vulnerably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, untouched by this indoor sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching potential heartbreak unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they see the dangers in their play?
segments.speaker: PAR
